CustomField.formula:
IF ( CASE( Position__r.Education_Requri__c ,
"High School", 1, "College", 2, "Masters", 3, "PhD", 4, "Post-doc", 5,0)
>
CASE( Candidate__r.Education__c , "High School", 1, "College",2, "Masters", 3, "PhD", 4, "Post-doc", 5, 0),
"Not Qualified", "Qualified")
CustomField.label: Candidate Qualified
